text: Parking is a 2019 internationally co-produced romantic drama film directed by Tudor Giurgiu. It is based on the novel Apropierea by Marin Mălaicu-Hondrari who co-wrote the screenplay along Giurgiu. It stars Mihai Smarandache, Belén Cuesta, Ariadna Gil and Luis Bermejo. The story is set in 2002 and revolves around Adrian (Smarandache), a Romanian undocumented immigrant who works as a security guard at a parking lot in Córdoba, Spain. The film premiered on June 14, 2019 as the opener of 18th Transilvania International Film Festival. It was nominated for eight categories at the 2020 Gopo Awards, including Best Film. == References == == External links == * Category:2010s multilingual films Category:2019 romantic drama films Category:2019 drama films Category:2019 films Category:Czech films Category:Films about immigration Category:Films set in Andalusia Category:Films shot in Spain Category:Romanian films Category:Romanian multilingual films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish multilingual films Category:Spanish romantic drama films Category:Spanish-language films
title: Parking (2019 film)
